div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in https://mos.esante.gouv.fr/NOS/JDV_J237-RegionOM-ROR/FHIR/JDV-J237-RegionOM-ROR
Import all the codes that are contained in https://mos.esante.gouv.fr/NOS/JDV_J223-TypeDivisionTerritoriale-ROR/FHIR/JDV-J223-TypeDivisionTerritoriale-ROR

title.value: Fusion du valueset J223-TypeDivisionTerritoriale-ROR et JDV_J237-RegionOM-ROR
